name: ts-for-gir
description: Typescript .d.ts generator from GIR for gjs and node-gtk

scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.update: npm run update:submodules && npm run update:packages
scripts.test: npm run regress && npm run test:ava && npm run test:girs:all && npm run build && npm run build:examples:all && npm run start:cli-examples:all
scripts.test:ava: npm run build:ts && npm run build:test:ava && ava tmp/test/ava/test.js
scripts.test:girs:all: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:all && npm run validate:types:all
scripts.test:girs:gjs: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:gjs && npm run validate:types:gjs
scripts.test:girs:node: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:node && npm run validate:types:node
scripts.test:girs:gtk3: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:gtk3 && npm run validate:types:gtk3
scripts.test:girs:gtk4: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:gtk4 && npm run validate:types:gtk4
scripts.test:girs:rygelcore2: npm run update:submodules && npm run build:types:rygelcore2 && npm run validate:types:rygelcore2
scripts.regress: npm run build:ts && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.regress.rc.js' && npm run validate
scripts.build: npm run clear:build && npm run lint && npm run build:ts && npm run chmod
scripts.build:examples:all: npm run build && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.start:cli-examples:all: npm run start:cli-examples:gjs && npm run start:cli-examples:node
scripts.build:types:gjs: npm run clear:types:gjs && npm run build:types:all -- --environments=gjs
scripts.build:types:node: npm run clear:types:node && npm run build:types:all -- --environments=node
scripts.build:types:gtk3: npm run clear:types && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.gtk3.rc.js'
scripts.build:types:gtk4: npm run clear:types && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.gtk4.rc.js'
scripts.build:types:rygelcore2: npm run clear:types && npm run start -- generate --configName='.ts-for-gir.rygelcore2.rc.js'
scripts.validate:types:all: npm run validate:types:gjs && npm run validate:types:node
scripts.clear: npm run clear:build && npm run clear:types
